message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $150. It's a great deal and worth every penny! Let me know if you're interested.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget. I can come down to $140, but that's my final offer.  It's still a good price for a quality product.  Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I can do $125, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
